author: jdillon
msg: Include juddi 0.9rc4 in a local repo to avoid needing to use a legacy repository which can cause strange dep resolution errors in m2

author: jdillon
msg: Update commons-modeler to the latest 2.0 (which is in an m2 repo, so we can drop the legacy m1 repo hack)

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-1344: Generate 10.2.1.7 snapshot, which includes source code changes needed to adapt our JDBC4 drivers to the removal of EoD from the spec.

author: jochen
msg: Replacing the resource for LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt with a use of the
maven-antrun-plugin. This allows to use the maven-source-plugin, which
has a bug, if a resource is using the base directory.
